column1: '''''Tolkien: A Celebration: Collected Writings on a Literary Legacy''''' is a collection of essays on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his works. Many of the chapters focus on Catholic themes.
The article "Tolkien and C.S. Lewis: An Interview with Walter Hooper" includes quotes attributed to J.R.R. Tolkien.
